documentation.description: Returns the source of a document.

type.description: The type of the document; deprecated and optional starting with 7.0

deprecated.description: Specifying types in urls has been deprecated

preference.description: Specify the node or shard the operation should be performed on (default: random)

realtime.description: Specify whether to perform the operation in realtime or search mode

refresh.description: Refresh the shard containing the document before performing the operation

_source.description: True or false to return the _source field or not, or a list of fields to return

_source_excludes.description: A list of fields to exclude from the returned _source field

_source_includes.description: A list of fields to extract and return from the _source field

version.description: Explicit version number for concurrency control
